mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TOUR_DAY td INNER JOIN PLACE_TOUR_DAY ptd ON td.tourDayId = ptd.fk_tourDayId INNER JOIN PHOTO_PLACE pp ON pp.fk_placeId = ptd.fk_placeId INNER JOIN PHOTO photo ON pp.fk_photoId = photo.photoId WHERE fk_tourId=#{id}
SELECT DISTINCT t.tourId FROM `PLACE_TOUR_DAY` ptd INNER JOIN TOUR_DAY td ON ptd.fk_tourDayId=td.tourDayId INNER JOIN TOUR t ON td.fk_tourId = t.tourId WHERE ptd.fk_placeId=#{placeId}

SELECT * FROM TOUR WHERE MATCH (name,description) AGAINST (CONCAT(#{keyword},'*') IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE)
SELECT * FROM TOUR WHERE 1
AND isVerified=0
AND isPublished=0
ORDER BY lastModified DESC
SELECT category.*, b.* FROM CATEGORY category INNER JOIN CATEGORY_TOUR b ON category.categoryId = b.fk_categoryId WHERE b.fk_tourId = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE TOUR SET isVerified=#{verified} WHERE tourId=#{tourId}
UPDATE TOUR SET isPublished=#{public} WHERE tourId=#{tourId}
